    • Method Detail

      • signEncryptFile

        public static void signEncryptFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                                   org.bouncycastle.openpgp.PGPPublicKeyRing publicKey,
                                   org.bouncycastle.openpgp.PGPSecretKeyRing secretKey,
                                   char[] password,
                                   boolean encrypt,
                                   boolean sign,
                                   boolean compress,
                                   boolean radix64,
                                   boolean isCAST5)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Runs sign and encrypt of the given file, saves result to fileName.pgp
        Parameters:
        fileName - file path to sign/encrypt
        publicKey - used for encryption
        secretKey - used for signing
        password - used for accessing the secretKey
        encrypt - whether to encrypt
        sign - whether to sign
        compress - whether to compress
        radix64 - whether to run radix-64 conversion
        isCAST5 - whether CAST5 or 3DES is used (true for CAST5, false for 3DES)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if any operation fails

      • decryptAndVerify

        public static java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> decryptAndVerify(java.lang.String filename,
                                                                    char[] passphrase)
                                                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                    org.bouncycastle.openpgp.PGPException,
                                                                    java.security.SignatureException
        Runs decryption and verification of the given file, saves result to decrypted.txt
        Parameters:
        filename - file path to decrypt/verify
        passphrase - used for accessing the secret key for decryption
        Returns:
        optional message for the UI regarding this operation
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if IO operation has failed
        org.bouncycastle.openpgp.PGPException - if PGP operation has failed
        java.security.SignatureException - if unsuccessful signature check
